label.welcome.title: Crafted Launcher
label.welcome.message: Welcome to the Crafted Launcher, This project was made by RaftDev because of need of a easy-to-use fast launcher for Minecraft. I highly recommend trying other projects like MultiMC, CurseForge, GDLauncher, ect.. and try to find the one that suits you the best! Crafted Launcher is fully open-source so if you have an issue or want to add a feature don't hesitate to make an issue or a pull request on the github page!
